InfoItems.Info:
This Macro store and delete the Sequence 999, the Macro 997, 998 and 999! First step, select the Fixtures you want to have in the Chase. Next step, choose an empty Executor with the Select key. Next step, start the Macro. - Type in the amount of Fixtures you have selected. - Type in the Preset numbers you want to use - for example: 4.2, 4.3 and 4.4 for MixColor Red, Green and Blue.
Let the Macro do your work :-)
PS.: combine your selection with MATricks Groups, Blocks and Wings before you start the Macro.
